info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Union, Jackson, eastern Perry and northeastern Cape Girardeau Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 609 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along the Mississippi River from 5 miles east of Perryville to 5 miles north of Cape Girardeau, drifting northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Altenburg and Grand Tower. This includes Interstate 55 near Mile Marker 132. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
